title: Devouring the Genes of Celestial in The Beginning - Novel Updates
author: 怪獣
description:
After being reborn in Marvel, Yi Nuo inherited the Umbrella Cooperation and got the gene devouring system!

First went to Missouri, the hometown of Star Lord, and devoured the flower of the gods.
Went to Malaysia to find the crashed spacecraft to devour the Venom.
There was also the blood of Hulk, the Supersoldier serum of Captain America, Pym particles, the Extremis Virus, the power of Thor, the Chaos Magic, the gods…

Started genetic engineering to create a super genetic warrior: Valkyrie Angel.
Controlled the planet and created a celestial supercomputer.
Communicated with the stars and guided the extinct Supernova.
Understood and mastered the Universe.>
